title: Dear God Riot Please Help With my Connection Issues

embed.description: Share your screenshot. Easy screenshot upload and storage

Target WTFast.com									


Here is the trace route... the spacing got a bit weird in this post format that you have

Okay so basically this has been happening to me for the good part of 2014 and as a result I can't play ranked or even normals anymore... Here is  a video of how I have to play league... 
http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2cyypj_img-0283_auto
this is what happens for every spike that I have on the wtfast graph linked before which usually occurs every minute or so.

NO RECONNECTING SCREEN JUST FREEZE FRAMES.

I've only ever had this problem on the oce server. 

It has literally made your game unbearable for me... 

I never lag like this when playing any other games!
Only LoL has this problem!

any thoughts?

replies.body: Those Telstra Hops looking like %%%% with all that packet loss.
they recommended wtfast a while ago :/
Well, have you tried it without using a VPN? Considered that VPNs are actually forbidden for use during games, you might get a drastically different result.
